title: Episode 31- Hot Takes from Jacob: the Sexist Feminist
description:
Today I have a conversation with my friend Jacob about gender and women in the Torah. He claims this conversation will get me canceled, but I'm hoping that's not the case. Jacob has some strong opinions  but I appreciated his perspective and enjoyed exploring the ideas of gender with him. I hope you will too!

Jacobs channel: https://youtube.com/c/faturechi
